adversarial_exit_mechanisms.name: Recommend Saving Most Frequently Used Configuration
adversarial_exit_mechanisms.description: System recommends saving 'most frequently used configuration' before exit to improve next session experience
adversarial_exit_mechanisms.rationale: Improves user experience by preserving frequently used settings
adversarial_exit_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Helps users resume work faster next time
adversarial_exit_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates explicit recommendation and implicit preference

adversarial_exit_mechanisms.name: Prepare Better Experience for Next Time

adversarial_exit_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Improves user experience without user effort
adversarial_exit_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates default selection and state-driven behavior

adversarial_exit_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates automatic behavior and state-driven optimization
